actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require that the processes of legislating and rulemaking be accompanied by as assessment of regional economic impact, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Regional Economic Impact Assessment Act - Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the Director of the Congressional Budget Office to prepare a regional economic impact assessment of each public bill or resolution reported by a congressional committee analyzing the differential economic impact of such bill or various regions of the United States. Requires that a similar such notice be prepared and made public for each Federal agency rule proposed.

titles.title: A bill to require that the processes of legislating and rulemaking be accompanied by as assessment of regional economic impact, and for other purposes.
